about_the_game:
'Unleash the Fury of Punch and Witness Rivulets of Sweat
An Action-Packed Martial Arts RPG

'Venture into the untamed realm of Ataho, the enigmatic protagonist, secluded within the heart of the rugged mountains.
A fateful day dawns when a formidable tiger fist martial artist emerges,
beckoning Ataho to partake in an epic martial arts showdown,
but he gets caught up in unforeseen events...

'GENSEI SUIKODEN' is a classic top-down RPG. While it serves as a sequel to the 'GENSEI' series released on the Japanese DS, its story is entirely standalone, making it accessible to newcomers as well.

The game offers an average playtime of around 24 hours, which isn't overly long, but it compensates with a variety of hidden events, mini-games, and secret pathways. These features ensure that each playthrough can feel fresh and exciting, providing new experiences every time.

The core gameplay revolves around navigating 2D maps, gathering information in towns, clearing events, and progressing through the unfolding story. As you move through the maps, you'll encounter enemies, and when battle begins, the screen switches to a side-view format. The combat system allows you to use both regular attacks and special moves freely, making it easy to win battles. Even if your entire party is defeated in combat, you can immediately revive from that point and continue your journey.

'GENSEI SUIKODEN PLUS' is based on 'GENSEI SUIKODEN,' featuring completely new resources that have been reimagined in a modern pixel art style. The game has been enhanced with improved resolution and updated visuals.

In addition, 'GENSEI SUIKODEN PLUS' includes exclusive content that expands upon the original experience, making it even more enjoyable.

short_description: The refreshing and brisk-paced turn-based combat remains unchanged! The visuals are scaled up, and the movements are made even more delightful! Let's enjoy the nostalgic BGM and witty lines with puns! Packed with exclusive original content not found in the original work!
